statements: SELECT * FROM employee_hand_geometry WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT employee_id, access_level FROM employee_hand_geometry WHERE access_level = 'Admin';
SELECT entry_time, access_level FROM employee_hand_geometry ORDER BY entry_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_hand_geometry WHERE access_level IN ('Admin', 'Manager');
SELECT employee_id, hand_geometry_data FROM employee_hand_geometry LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM employee_hand_geometry WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT employee_id, access_level FROM employee_hand_geometry WHERE access_level = 'Admin' ORDER BY entry_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_hand_geometry WHERE access_level IN ('Admin', 'Manager') AND entry_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employee_hand_geometry WHERE employee_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY employee_id DESC, entry_time ASC;
SELECT employee_id, hand_geometry_data FROM employee_hand_geometry WHERE hand_geometry_data IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT last_name, first_name FROM employees ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE access_granted = true;
SELECT access_time, access_granted FROM access_control ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT last_name, first_name FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 10;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) FROM access_control GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT employee_id, access_time FROM access_control WHERE access_granted = true ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeHandGeometry WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM EmployeeDetails WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_id, access_location FROM EmployeeAccessLog ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees FROM EmployeeDetails;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeHandGeometry WHERE access_level = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeHandGeometry WHERE access_level = 'Admin';
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM EmployeeDetails WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_id FROM EmployeeAccessLog WHERE access_location = 'Main Entrance' ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, department FROM EmployeeDetails WHERE department IN ('HR', 'Finance') LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeHandGeometry JOIN EmployeeDetails ON EmployeeHandGeometry.employee_id = EmployeeDetails.employee_id WHERE EmployeeHandGeometry.employee_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT full_name FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, full_name FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM departments ORDER BY department_id DESC;
SELECT e.full_name, a.level_name FROM employees e JOIN employee_access ea ON e.employee_id = ea.employee_id JOIN access_levels a ON ea.level_id = a.level_id;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT full_name FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, hand_geometry_data FROM employees WHERE employee_id > 1 ORDER BY hand_geometry_data DESC;
SELECT employees.full_name, departments.department_name FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.employee_id = departments.department_id;

SELECT employees.full_name, access_levels.level_name FROM employees JOIN employee_access ON employees.employee_id = employee_access.employee_id JOIN access_levels ON employee_access.level_id = access_levels.level_id;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, hand_geometry_data FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, level_id FROM employee_access;
SELECT * FROM departments WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT department_id, department_name FROM departments ORDER BY department_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, hand_geometry_data FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT e.employee_id, e.hand_geometry_data, l.level_name FROM employees e JOIN employee_access ea ON e.employee_id = ea.employee_id JOIN access_levels l ON ea.level_id = l.level_id;
SELECT d.department_name, COUNT(de.employee_id) AS total_employees FROM departments d LEFT JOIN department_employees de ON d.department_id = de.department_id GROUP BY d.department_id;

SELECT e.employee_id, e.hand_geometry_data, d.department_name FROM employees e JOIN department_employees de ON e.employee_id = de.employee_id JOIN departments d ON de.department_id = d.department_id WHERE d.department_id = 1;
